channel.title: Music – Brook Benton
channel.description: Recent content in Brook Benton on Music

item.title: Brook Benton - Think Twice
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Joeseph Shapiro, Jimmy Williams, Clyde Otis
KY: 8737 / KY: 7184

Think twice
before you answer
Think twice
before you say yes
I’m asking you
if you love me true
‘Cause you’re
my happiness
Take your time
think it over
Think twice
then let me know
If you don’t feel
That your love is real
Tell me although
you’ll hurt me so
It Funny how a word
can mean everything
Well That’s why
I want you
To talk to me
to hear you
Say my name
I’d give anything
Only you can decide
What my future will be
Think twice
before you answer
Think twice
whatever you do
A love
as strong as mine
Can stand the
test of time so
Think twice of the
one who loves you-
